title: Riot needs to get AFK in ranked under control.
body: I had 3 games in a row with AFK's. This problem is getting out of hand.  Riot needs to crack down harder or adapt to a "Loss prevented" system regarding AFK's.

replies.body: Hopefully you're reporting those AFK's in post game to make sure they get sent our way! Luckily the system is capable of detecting AFK's as well so they should be caught regardless.
